about_the_game:
Run your bicycle workshop and repair bicycles by your own hand. Tighten the screws, adjust the chain, and then do some personalized printing. Ready to assemble frame, derailleur, flywheel, pedal, brake, handle... . It's not just your sweat that makes you a bicycle repair master, but your attention to detail and skills.

Highly realistic parts for assembling


In Bicycle Mechanic Simulator, we reconstruct a large number of parts in detail, including frames, spokes, flywheels, chains, disc brakes, pedals, and more. The parts you know and the parts you don't know will give you the fun of assembling a bike in the game. Use different assembly tools to transform a bike from a scattering of parts into a shiny, stylish bike.

Experience the whole process of bicycle repair


Test, repair, maintenance, assembly, painting, conditioning. Complete the bicycle repair process in your bicycle workshop and immerse yourself in the sweat and smell of engine oil. Every order is a challenge. Don't forget to expand your workshop and buy new tools and parts so that you can get more orders and business.

Collect lots of different types of bicycle


As the owner of a bicycle workshop, you are also a collector of bicycles. When you see a bicycle you like, don't hesitate to buy it and make it part of your garage collection. Every unique bicycle may have a unique story behind it. A bicycle made with your hands can also become a hot work of art in the market.

Roll up your sleeves! You must be professional enough to create a shiny perfect bike.
